badge_template_activities.title: Student created and presented a capstone project, ending their DSI program.

3d099a0f-f93c-4ea4-9d6b-14cdb943aa68.description: Not a talker but a doer who demonstrated applied networking and cyber security skills related to ethical hacking during a live, Divergence Academy-hosted Capture the Flag challenge. Earners of this badge demonstrated competency in applying penetration testing techniques to discover and exploit a system's vulnerabilities.
3d099a0f-f93c-4ea4-9d6b-14cdb943aa68.name: Capture The Flag Participant

alignments.name: NICE Framework
alignments.description: The NICE Cybersecurity Workforce Framework is the foundation for increasing the size and capability of the U.S. cybersecurity workforce. It provides a common definition of cybersecurity, a comprehensive list of cybersecurity tasks, and the knowledge, skills, and abilities required to perform those tasks.

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a live Capture The Flag competition

skills.name: Exploit Creation: Binary and Webapp Exploits

92b3a827-2b71-4d58-89ec-547840a83874.description: A member of the winning team who gets bragging rights for demonstrating research skills and applied cyber security techniques related to ethical hacking during a live, Divergence Academy-hosted Capture the Flag challenge. Earners of this badge worked as a team to solve multiple puzzles with outside the box thinking in a high stress environment while applying penetration testing techniques to discover and exploit a system's vulnerabilities.
92b3a827-2b71-4d58-89ec-547840a83874.name: Capture The Flag Winner

alignments.name: NICE Framework
alignments.description: The NICE Cybersecurity Workforce Framework is the foundation for increasing the size and capability of the U.S. cybersecurity workforce. It provides a common definition of cybersecurity, a comprehensive list of cybersecurity tasks, and the knowledge, skills, and abilities required to perform those tasks.

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in a live Capture The Flag competition and be on the winning team.

skills.name: Exploit Creation: Binary and Webapp Exploits
